name: Cursed Loop
description:
Try to escape the time loop you've been trapped in by an evil witch!

Unfortunately you only have 30 seconds to live, but threat, your every attempt helps you in escaping. Your every loop gets saved and executed by a ghost in the next one. Thanks to that you are able to perform multiple actions in just a single loop. Let's see how fast you can escape.

Example gameplay showing 4 loops simultaneously:

Controls:

W/S/A/D - Move

E - Interact

Esc - Close Window

Changelog:

1.1                                                                                                                                         

-Fixed sprites being off-centre in some animations                                                         

-Made object colliders bigger                                                                                             

-Changed the amount of materials required for smelter, bridge and hungry guy        

-Removed all unused assets(675MB -> 226MB)                                                              

-Fixed a bug where defeat screen would show up even though the player already escaped the loop                                                                                                                  

-Fixed a bug where inventory UI would still be visible even though the player already escaped the loop 

-Changed archive file format to .zip due to some people having issues with .rar

1.0                                                                                                                                          -Initial Release

Made For: GJL Game Parade Fall 2021

Time: 7 days

Theme: Leave Something Behind

Software used: Unreal Engine 4.24; Photoshop

Cursed Loop was created by a solo dev. This is my first game since I graduated and I'm pretty happy how it turned out. The UI and sounds are the weakest part of this project and that's because I left them for last, which in hindsight probably wasn't the best idea.
